p: According different studies and reports by live gender data tracker, more infected men than women seem to be dying from the new coronavirus, in different countries hit by the pandemic [ 1, 2]. In France, during March 2020 we observed a more pronounced excess mortality in men than in women (+â€‰13%) compare to March 2019 and 2018. The excess mortality was even higher in region registering high rate of COVID-19 in North and East France [ 3].
